snippet: A growing list of government rules dictates how technology businesses must be run, including what they can do with their content.
abstract: Vietnam's high-tech industry is booming, but some analysts are concerned that new and pending government regulations, which dictate how businesses must be run, may hurt growth and entrepreneurship.
lead_paragraph: A growing list of government rules dictates how technology businesses must be run, including what they can do with their content.

headline.main: As Technology Entrepreneurs Multiply in Vietnam, So Do Regulations
headline.print_headline: As Technology Entrepreneurs Multiply in Vietnam, So Do Regulations
